text: Croce Taravella (born 1964) is an Italian painter. == Biography == Taravella came into contact with some members of the transavanguardia and invented a style of experimental painting. In 2011 he participated in the Venice Biennale, where he received praise from Vittorio Sgarbi. ==References== == External links == * http://www.exibart.com/profilo/eventiV2.asp?idelemento=140084 Category:1964 births Category:Living people Category:21st-century Italian painters Category:Italian male painters
title: Croce Taravella
